name: Spin for Love
storyline: Spin for love is an exploratory story of devotion to your one's pets, and what you must do to save them against all odds. Players must escape the lost island, with your pets after an unfortunate accident. As ever increasing odds stack against you, you must manage both your animals and your resources to ensure your survival.
